item.title: 印度央行行长认为收益率有下调空间，印度债券上涨
item.description: 印度储备银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）发出收益率有下降空间的信号后，印度债券创下一个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Indian bonds rose by the most in a month after Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra signaled room for yields to fall.】

item.title: 三星与 SK Hynix 签订协议，为 OpenAI 的星际之门提供设备
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）和SK海力士公司（SK Hynix Co., Ltd.）已达成初步协议，向OpenAI的星际之门（Stargate）项目供应芯片和其他设备，这项交易有助于巩固它们在人工智能先进存储芯片领域的领先地位。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Co. have forged initial agreements to supply chips and other gear to OpenAI’s Stargate project, a deal that helps shore up their lead in advanced memory chips for AI.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对估值的警告不会阻碍股市上涨
item.description:

item.title: 汽车供应商采埃孚削减成本，裁员 7,600 人
item.description: 采埃孚腓特烈港股份公司（ZF Friedrichshafen AG）将在其电气化传动系统部门裁减 7,600 个职位，因为这家德国汽车零部件制造商正在加大重组力度，以应对低迷的需求。【原文：ZF Friedrichshafen AG is cutting 7,600 positions at its electrified drivetrain division as the German car-parts maker steps up its restructuring efforts to deal with poor demand.】

item.title: 德国电网费用明年将下降 57%，以帮助降低电费
item.description: 在政府补贴的支持下，德国电网费用明年将下降 57%，这也是减轻家庭能源费用、提高国家工业竞争力的举措之一。【原文：German power-grid fees are set to drop 57% next year on the back of government subsidies, as part of a move to ease energy bills for households and make the country’s industries more competitive.】

item.title: 宜家不惧关税，斥资 22 亿美元进军美国曼哈顿
item.description: 瑞典家具巨头宜家（IKEA）正在曼哈顿扩张，丝毫不畏惧特朗普不断增加的关税。【原文：Swedish furniture giant IKEA is expanding in Manhattan, undeterred by mounting Trump tariffs.】

item.title: 华尔街未受鲍威尔 "高估值 "股票言论影响
item.description: 美联储主席再次指出美国股市估值过高。而投资者又一次或多或少地忽视了这一点。【原文：Once again, a Federal Reserve chair has made note of elevated US stock-market valuations. And once again, investors are more or less ignoring it.】

item.title: 富兰克林公司首席执行官珍妮-约翰逊（Jenny Johnson）表示不打算下台
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿投资公司（Franklin Templeton Investments）的珍妮-约翰逊（Jenny Johnson）表示，她不打算辞去这家资产规模达 1.6 万亿美元的资产管理公司首席执行官的职务。【原文：Franklin Templeton Investments’ Jenny Johnson said she had no plans to step down as chief executive officer of the $1.6 trillion asset manager.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀加速，支持欧洲央行对利率持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧元区 9 月份通胀加速，巩固了欧洲中央银行目前保持利率稳定的计划。【原文：Euro-area inflation accelerated in September, cementing the European Central Bank’s plans to keep interest rates steady for now.】

item.description:
与政府关系密切的公司收入激增，因为他们向企业提供如何规避进口关税的建议，并在特朗普的华盛顿扮演 "让我们达成协议 "的角色

。【原文：

item.title: 美国政府开始关门，美元延续跌势
item.description: 随着美国政府近七年来首次停摆，美元正走向一个月来最长的连跌走势。【原文：The dollar is heading for its longest losing streak in a month as the US entered its first government shutdown in nearly seven years.】

item.title: 尼日利亚工会同意结束丹格特炼油厂罢工
item.description: 在丹格特炼油厂同意重新分配被解雇的工人后，尼日利亚主要石油工会将结束威胁到该厂原油供应的罢工。【原文：Nigeria’s main oil labor union will end a strike that threatened to cut crude supplies to the Dangote oil refinery, after the company agreed to reassign workers who’ve been laid off.】

item.title: 阿斯利康、赛诺菲大涨，因看好制药公司能达成美国价格协议
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）、诺华公司（Novartis AG）、赛诺菲公司（Sanofi）和其他欧洲制药商因看好竞争对手辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc.【原文：AstraZeneca Plc, Novartis AG, Sanofi and other European drugmakers advanced on optimism that rival Pfizer Inc.’s pricing agreement opens the way for others to strike similar deals.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德为基础设施债务基金融资 40 亿美元
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）通过电子邮件发表声明称，其第四期基础设施债务基金首期募集资金超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management raised over $4 billion for an initial close of its fourth infrastructure debt fund, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: PMI 显示捷豹路虎停产加剧英国工厂低迷
item.description: 由于捷豹路虎的工厂暂时停产，英国工厂的生产量出现了六个月来的最大幅度下降，使该行业雪上加霜。【原文：British factories suffered the sharpest decline in production for six months, as the temporary shutdown of Jaguar Land Rover’s factories added to the sector’s woes.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称私人市场常青树需求旺盛
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）全球客户覆盖主管伊丽莎白-丹尼斯（Elizabeth Dennis）表示，虽然个人投资者在很大程度上被排除在资产类别之外，但选择在私人市场获取回报的投资者对常青基金的需求很大。【原文：Evergreen funds are in high demand from investors opting for returns in private markets though individual investors stay largely excluded from the asset class, according to Elizabeth Dennis, Morgan Stanley’s global head of client coverage.】

item.title: 印度将向本地银行融资开放 400 亿美元的并购市场
item.description: 印度央行计划允许当地贷款机构为并购提供融资，此举有望推动该国价值 400 多亿美元的交易市场。【原文：India’s central bank plans to permit local lenders to finance mergers and acquisitions, a move expected to boost the country’s $40 billion-plus deals market.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称政策宽松，支持将利率维持在 4% 的水平
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）周三在接受彭博电视采访时表示，相对于通胀和经济活动而言，英国的货币政策依然宽松。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said that UK monetary policy remains loose relative to inflation and economic activity, speaking in an interview with Bloomberg TV Wednesday.】

item.title: 杂货店赌场和前首席执行官在巴黎市场滥用审判中面临巨额罚款风险
item.description: 让-查尔斯-纳乌里（Jean-Charles Naouri）和他领导了三十年的法国杂货商将于周三在巴黎受审，指控他合谋操纵 Casino Guichard Perrachon SA 的股价。【原文：Jean-Charles Naouri and the French grocer that he led for three decades will stand trial in Paris on Wednesday over allegations he conspired to manipulate Casino Guichard Perrachon SA’s stock price.】

item.title: 高盛和凯雷将继贝莱德之后在科威特设立办事处
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团是计划在科威特开设办事处的金融公司之一，这将推动欧佩克成员国将自己定位为地区商业中心的新努力。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is among a cohort of financial firms planning to open offices in Kuwait, according to people familiar with the matter, in a boost to the OPEC member’s nascent efforts to position itself as a regional business hub.】

item.title: Oaktree 的波利说，旧的私人信贷交易将出现裂痕
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）全球信贷策略投资组合经理助理丹妮尔-波利（Danielle Poli）在接受彭博电视采访时说，古老的私人信贷交易会遇到一些问题。【原文：Vintage private credit deals will have some problems, Danielle Poli, assistant portfolio manager for Oaktree Capital Management’s global credit strategy, said in a Bloomberg TV interview.】

item.title: 尼日利亚总统称改革 "阵痛 "预示着新时代的开始
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布说，经过近三年的改革，尼日利亚经济已出现转机，增长加速，通胀放缓，债务成本下降。【原文：Nigeria’s economy has turned the corner after almost three years of reforms, with growth accelerating, inflation slowing and debt costs declining, President Bola Tinubu said.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德预测人工智能发展需要 7 万亿美元资金
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）首席财务官哈德利-皮尔-马歇尔（Hadley Peer Marshall）表示，人工智能的快速发展需要约 7 万亿美元的投资。【原文：There’s about $7 trillion of investment needed to finance the rapid growth of artificial intelligence, according to Hadley Peer Marshall, chief financial officer at Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 银行业前景看好，AT1 债券市场牛市创纪录
item.description: 尽管有人担心市场过热，但高风险银行债券的涨势丝毫没有减弱的迹象。【原文：Additional Tier 1 bonds have chalked up their biggest bull run ever, with a relentless rally in the risky bank debt showing no signs of letting up — despite some concerns about the market getting overheated.】

item.title: 诺华公司治疗慢性荨麻疹的新方法获美国批准
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）的一种治疗荨麻疹样皮肤病的新疗法在美国获得批准，进一步推动了这家瑞士制药商在免疫系统疾病领域的发展。【原文：Novartis AG won US approval for a new treatment for a hives-like skin condition, bolstering the Swiss drugmaker’s push into disorders of the immune system.】

item.title: 对冲基金戴维森-坎普纳称将向阿联酋银行购买坏账
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP 已从阿布扎比商业银行（Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank PJSC）收购了约 14 亿美元的坏账，这是美国对冲基金与该酋长国最大的贷款机构之一进行的第二笔此类交易。【原文：Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP has acquired about $1.4 billion in bad debt from Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank PJSC, people familiar with the matter said, the second such transaction between the US hedge fund and one of the emirate’s largest lenders.】

item.title: 欧洲银行股创新高后仍有吸引力
item.description: 欧洲银行股刚刚追平了创纪录的季度连胜纪录，而对多头来说，好消息是它们的表现看起来还远远没有到捉襟见肘的地步。【原文：European banking stocks have just matched their record quarterly winning run and the good news for bulls is that their performance looks far from stretched.】
